forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Becoming partly cloudy after some morning rain. High 14C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Becoming partly cloudy after some morning rain. High 56F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 7C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy this evening, then becoming cloudy after midnight. Low around 45F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Windy with periods of rain. Low 48F. Winds SE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies. Low 51F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday

forecastday.fcttext: Steady light rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 52F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.
